creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: grey cloth (possibly discolored from cream or white) strip; woven at each end with four red bands of dense geometric diamond patterns separated by patterned and dashed bands in red, yellow, brown and khaki; tassels on sides and ends from long loose weaving threads on back
title: Turban
